docs.title: 📊 Welcome to the Ama VS Project
docs.text: A streamlined data automation and dashboarding workflow using Python, Streamlit, and GitHub.

docs.title: 📌 Overview
docs.text:
• ✅ Automated Excel file handling
  • ✅ Jupyter notebook conversion with GitHub Actions
  • ✅ Streamlit dashboard for quick data insights
  • ✅ GitHub Pages documentation

docs.title: ⚙️ Getting Started
docs.text:
1. Install dependencies:

    bash pip install -r requirements.txt

  2. Launch the dashboard:

    bash streamlit run streamlit_app.py

docs.title: 🖼️ Screenshots
docs.text:
Add screenshots inside /docs/assets/ and embed like:

![App Preview](assets/sample_dashboard.png)

docs.title: ❓ FAQ
docs.text:
Q: Can I use this project on my own datasets? Yes! Just replace the Excel files and restart the Streamlit app.

Q: How do I customize the automation? Edit Ama.py or extend streamlit_app.py to fit your workflow.

docs.title: 👤 About
docs.text: Created by Austineama Built with 💡 and powered by Python, GitHub, and Streamlit.
